instructions.de: Rechts halten an der Gabelung Richtung Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Mantente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tenir à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Tetap kanan di pertigaan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Mantieni la destra al bivio verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: 右車線を進み、Destination 1へ向かう
instructions.my: Destination 1ဆီသို့ ညာဘက်ကို ဆက်သွားပါ
instructions.nl: Houd rechts, in de richting van Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rozwidleniu trzymaj się prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Mantenha-se à direita na bifurcação sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Mantenha-se à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Țineți dreapta la bifurcație spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: На развилке двигайтесь направо в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sl: Držite se desnov smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametindeki yol ayrımında sağ yönde kal
instructions.zh-Hans: 在岔道口保持向右，前往Destination 1
